name: SteamCmd Windows Dedicated Server Egg
author: ir3nicuz@local.host
description: A generic Egg for SteamCmd Dedicated Server started with wine docker image.

variables.name: Steam Game AppID
variables.description: This is the app id for the Dedicated Server Files Package on SteamDB.

variables.name: Path to Dedicated Server Exe
variables.description: This is the relative path within the container to the Exe.

variables.name: Startup Parameter for Dedicated Server Exe
variables.description: Defining all required startup parameters. Relative Paths will normally be routed from the Game-Engine to Container_root.

variables.name: Force Server Version
variables.description: Setting a special server version tag for doanload, set empty to get latest stable
